effect.diamond_pearl: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.platinum: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.platinum: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
flavor_text.platinum: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
